title: Tassel, 18th century
medium: Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core
description: Skirt of white silk threads, partly covered with metal threads, all looped and each supporting a colored tassel. Collar of silk and metal threads. Head is vase-shaped and wrapped in silver and gilt threads. Loop of braided pink, blue, yellow and white threads.

tombstone.epitaph: Tassel, 18th century.Medium: silk, metal thread, wooden core. 1908-2-24.
